title: PMS 2.0 653 - NFL Draft Round 1 Recap, Ian Rapoport, Peter Schrager, Jay Glazer, Darius Butler, & AJ Hawk
description: On today's show, Pat, AJ Hawk, Darius Butler, and the boys are joined by Ian Rapoport (18:05-49:15), Peter Schrager (58:18-1:23:41), and Jay Glazer (1:23:43-1:47:09) to recap everything that happened in the Draft Spectacular and round one of the NFL Draft, including all the trades that shocked us, who might be on the move today or tomorrow, and who ultimately won Round 1. Make sure you subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow to watch the show, and listen to Sirius XM Channel 82, Mad Dog Radio. We appreciate the hell out of all you. See you tomorrow, cheers.
dc:creator: Pat McAfee
